         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365433">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365433">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Rachel Hamelers
           </b>
           <br />
           Math, Science, and FYS Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3601
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           For secondary sources, use the databases on the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=352884">
            First Year Seminar Subject Guide
           </a>
           or other
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=356743">
            subject guides
           </a>
           specific to your topic.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365433" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365434">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365434">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365434">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary Sources: National Context
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365434">
          <p>
           The following are a selection of national media sources available in Trexler Library for the 1930s and/or 1960s.&nbsp; The table indicates the publication titles, the format in which they are available, and the location in the library where they can be found.&nbsp; This is not a complete list of available titles.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <table style="width: 453px; height: 414px;" border="1">
            <tbody>
             <tr valign="top">
              <td>
               <strong>
                <em>
                 Publication Title
                </em>
               </strong>
              </td>
              <td>
               <strong>
                <em>
                 Format
                </em>
               </strong>
              </td>
              <td>
               <strong>
                <em>
                 Location
                </em>
               </strong>
              </td>
              <td>
               <em>
                <strong>
                 Indexing Tools
                </strong>
               </em>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr valign="top">
              <td>
               <em>
                The Atlantic
               </em>
              </td>
              <td>
               Paper
              </td>
              <td>
               051
              </td>
              <td>
               <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=rgr&amp;jid=4TB&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live">
                <em>
                 Readers' Guide Retrospective
                </em>
               </a>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr valign="top">
              <td>
               <em>
                Business Week
               </em>
              </td>
              <td>
               Microfilm
              </td>
              <td>
               Level A
              </td>
              <td>
               <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=rgr&amp;jid=D2S2&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live">
                <em>
                 Readers' Guide Retrospective
                </em>
               </a>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr valign="top">
              <td>
               <em>
                Commonweal
               </em>
              </td>
              <td>
               Microfilm

              <td>
               Level A
              </td>
              <td>

              </td>

                <em>
                 Readers' Guide Retrospective

               </a>
              </td>
             </tr>

              <td>
               <em>

              <td>

              </td>
              <td>

                <em>

               </a>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr valign="top">
              <td>
               <em>
                The Nation

              </td>
              <td>
               Paper and Microfilm
              </td>
              <td>
               051
              </td>
              <td>
               <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=rgr&amp;jid=NAT&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live">
                <em>
                 Readers' Guide Retrospective
                </em>
               </a>
              </td>
             </tr>

              <td>

               910.5n1
              </td>

                <em>
                 Readers' Guide Retrospective
                </em>
               </a>
              </td>

                or
                <br />

                 http://query.nytimes.com

                 /search/query?srchst=p
                </a>

               </em>
              </td>
              <td>
               Microfilm
              </td>
              <td>
               Level A
              </td>
              <td>
               <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=rgr&amp;jid=USN&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live">
                <em>
                 Readers' Guide Retrospective
                </em>
               </a>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <em>
            <strong>
             More on Indexing Tools
            </strong>
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           While it is possible to browse each publication individually, it may be more effective to use various indexing tools to search across the publications.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <strong>
             <em>
              Readers' Guide Retrospective
             </em>
            </strong>
            <br />
            Provides indexing of general-interest periodicals published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.&nbsp; Most of the above titles, except for the
            <em>
             New York Times
            </em>
            , are indexed in
            <em>
             Readers' Guide Retrospective
            </em>
            .&nbsp;
            <br />
            LOCATION:
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr">
             Online
            </a>
            <br />
            NOTE: A print version of this index, known as the Readers' Guide to Periodical Literature, is also available at 051 R286g
           </p>
           <p>
            <span class="style5">
             New York Times Index
            </span>
            <br />
            The
            <em>
             New York Times
            </em>
            has its own index, called the
            <em>
             New York Times Index
            </em>
            , but is also searchable online through the
            <em>
             New York Times
            </em>
            website.&nbsp;
            <br />
            PRINT LOCATION: 071.471 N532y1
            <br />
            ONLINE LOCATION:
            <a href="http://query.nytimes.com/search/query?srchst=p">
             http://query.nytimes.com/search/query?srchst=p
            </a>
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17365434" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365436">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365436">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365436">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary Sources: Muhlenberg Context
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365436">
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <strong>
             <em>
              Ciarla
             </em>
             (Yearbooks)
             <br />
            </strong>
            Call number 378.748 M952c
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Muhlenberg Weekly
             </strong>
            </em>
            <strong>
             (Newspaper)
            </strong>
            <em>
             <strong>
              <br />
             </strong>
            </em>
            Call number 371.897m2
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17365436" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4712888" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365437">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365437">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365437">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365437">
          <p>
           For information on
           <strong>
            why to cite your sources
           </strong>
           and
           <strong>
            how to avoid plagiarism
           </strong>
           , see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
            Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
           </a>
           guide.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           For information on
           <strong>
            various citation styles
           </strong>
           , see:
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/reshelp/citations.html">
            Trexler Library Citation Guides
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365437" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
